title: STAT+: UnitedHealth proclaims audits show it has ‘robust’ procedures, in contrast to findings of independent reviews
description: UnitedHealth Group said Friday that the consultants it hired to audit its operations found they’re not only “robust,” but “industry leading.”
content: UnitedHealth Group said Friday that the consultants it hired to audit its operations found they’re not only “robust,” but “industry leading.”
